text: (Nampikkaiyalarkale!) Unkalil (unmaiyakave manam virumpi) por purintavarkal yarenpataiyum allahvaiyum, avanutaiya tutaraiyum, nampikkaiyalarkalaiyum tavira (marrevaraiyum tankal) antaranka nanparkalaka etuttuk kollatavarkal yar enpataiyum, allah (unkalaic cotittu) arivikkamal, ninkal vittu vitappatuvirkal enru ennik kontirkala? Allah ninkal ceypavarrai nankarintavan avan
